title: FS - T205 Fred Clarke SGC "2" [NO LONGER FOR SALE]

posts.post_title: FS - T205 Fred Clarke SGC "2" [NO LONGER FOR SALE]
posts.post_content:
T205 SGC Graded "2" Fred Clarke [NO LONGER FOR SALE]

If you want to purchase this card:

1. The first person to post "I'll take it" will get the card.  The "I'll take it" post will win out versus anyone who I may be in current conversation with for the card.
2. Email me at [url]jmanners51@gmail.com[/url] by putting the name of the card in the subject line and your address in the email text.
3. Make payment by Paypal (PPFF).
4. I don't have easy access to a Post Office so please leave up to 5 days for me to get to the Post Office to mail the card.
